price: Ameziumba mbingu na ardhi kwa Haki. Ametukuka na wanayo shirikisha.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
footnotes: Yeye ameumba mbingu na ardhi kwa mujibu wa hikima. Ametakasika kuwa na mshirika wa kufanya lolote katika utawala wake, au wa kuabudiwa kama Yeye.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi taʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
